fields.name: Eat Grass (Passive):
fields.value: You gain a score boost equal to 1% for each character in your response.

fields.name: Fatten Up (Passive):
fields.value: Once you place in the top 3, you are ready for slaughter.

fields.name: Reincarnation (Passive):
fields.value: The first time you die, you will roll a new role and re-enter the game.
